description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣第二子，初封高阳王，后晋封汉王。因发动“高煦之乱”谋反失败，被明宣宗废为庶人并以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: The second son of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di of the Ming Dynasty. He was first enfeoffed as the Prince of Gaoyang, and later as the Prince of Han. He was executed by the Xuande Emperor after his failed rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，通过靖难之役从其侄建文帝手中夺取皇位，朱高煦之父。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, who seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign. He was the father of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣的皇后，明朝开国功臣徐达之女，朱高煦之母。
description.en: Empress of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di, daughter of the Ming Dynasty founding general Xu Da, and mother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，朱高煦之祖父。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, and the grandfather of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年，燕王朱棣为争夺皇位而发动的战争，最终成功夺取政权。
description.en: A civil war in the early Ming Dynasty, launched by Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, to seize the throne, which ultimately succeeded.

description.zh-cn: 宣德元年，汉王朱高煦趁北京地震之机，在自己的封地乐安州发动的叛乱，很快被明宣宗御驾亲征平定。
description.en: A rebellion launched in 1426 by Zhu Gaoxu, Prince of Han, in his fief of Le'an Prefecture, taking advantage of an earthquake in Beijing. It was quickly suppressed by the Xuande Emperor who personally led the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明仁宗朱高炽长子，朱高煦之侄。他平定了叔父朱高煦的叛乱。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, eldest son of the Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi, and nephew of Zhu Gaoxu. He suppressed the rebellion of his uncle Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖长子，朱高煦之兄。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, eldest son of the Yongle Emperor, and elder brother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦的正妻，永乐二年册为汉王妃，后与朱高煦一同被明宣宗处死。
description.en: The principal consort of Zhu Gaoxu, made Princess of Han in 1404. She was later executed along with Zhu Gaoxu by the Xuande Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，朱高煦之祖母。
description.en: The empress of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, and the grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国军事统帅，位列开国“六王”之首，封中山武宁王，朱高煦之外祖父。
description.en: A founding military marshal of the Ming Dynasty, ranked first among the six founding 'kings', enfeoffed as Prince of Zhongshan. He was the maternal grandfather of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 徐达之妻，朱高煦之外祖母。
description.en: Wife of Xu Da and maternal grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初军事人物，谢夫人之父。
description.en: A military figure during the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties, father of Lady Xie.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年重要将领，淇国公，曾在储位之争中支持朱高煦。
description.en: An important general in the early Ming Dynasty, Duke of Qi, who supported Zhu Gaoxu in the struggle for the crown prince position.

description.zh-cn: 明朝驸马，曾在储位之争中支持朱高煦。
description.en: An imperial son-in-law of the Ming Dynasty who supported Zhu Gaoxu in the struggle for the crown prince position.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦次子，因向明成祖告发其父的过恶而为人所知，后被明仁宗废为庶人，最终在宣德元年与父同死。
description.en: The second son of Zhu Gaoxu, known for reporting his father's wrongdoings to the Yongle Emperor. He was later demoted to a commoner by the Hongxi Emperor and eventually died with his father in 1426.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁大学士，在平定高煦之乱时，力劝明宣宗御驾亲征。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty who strongly advised the Xuande Emperor to personally lead the campaign to suppress Zhu Gaoxu's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，封英国公。朱高煦谋反时曾试图勾结他作为内应。
description.en: A general of the Ming Dynasty, enfeoffed as Duke of Ying. Zhu Gaoxu attempted to collude with him as an insider during his rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦长子，封汉世子，早逝。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhu Gaoxu, enfeoffed as the Heir Apparent of Han, who died young.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦三子，封汉世子，后与父同死。
description.en: The third son of Zhu Gaoxu, enfeoffed as the Heir Apparent of Han, who later died with his father.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦因其父明成祖曾许诺立其为太子，故在兄长朱高炽被立为太子后心有不甘，不断找机会攻击太子。
description.en: Zhu Gaoxu was resentful after his elder brother Zhu Gaochi was made crown prince, as their father, the Yongle Emperor, had once promised the position to him. He continuously sought opportunities to attack the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦曾企图在明宣宗即位途中设伏，后于宣德元年（1426年）起兵谋反，是为高煦之乱。
description.en: Zhu Gaoxu attempted to ambush the Xuande Emperor on his way to the throne, and later in 1426, he launched a rebellion, known as the Gao Xu's Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 靖难成功后，丘福等旧臣因朱高煦有战功而支持立其为太子。
description.en: After the success of the Jingnan Campaign, Qiu Fu and other old courtiers supported making Zhu Gaoxu the crown prince due to his military merits.

description.zh-cn: 靖难成功后，王宁等旧臣因朱高煦有战功而支持立其为太子。
description.en: After the success of the Jingnan Campaign, Wang Ning and other old courtiers supported making Zhu Gaoxu the crown prince due to his military merits.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦在靖难之役时立有战功，多次营救其父明成祖于危难之中。
description.en: Zhu Gaoxu achieved military merits during the Jingnan Campaign, repeatedly rescuing his father, the Yongle Emperor, from danger.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋于洪武二十八年（1395年）封朱高煦为高阳王。
description.en: In 1395, the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang enfeoffed Zhu Gaoxu as the Prince of Gaoyang.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣于永乐二年（1404年）封朱高煦为汉王。
description.en: In 1404, the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di enfeoffed Zhu Gaoxu as the Prince of Han.

description.zh-cn: 宣德元年，朱高煦趁北京地震之机，在乐安州谋反，并企图勾结英国公张辅为内应。
description.en: In 1426, Zhu Gaoxu took advantage of an earthquake in Beijing to launch a rebellion in Le'an Prefecture, attempting to collude with Zhang Fu, the Duke of Ying, as an insider.

description.zh-cn: 在朱高煦谋反时，杨荣力谏明宣宗御驾亲征，最终迅速平定叛乱。
description.en: During Zhu Gaoxu's rebellion, Yang Rong strongly advised the Xuande Emperor to personally lead the campaign, which led to the swift suppression of the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 永乐十四年，明成祖得知朱高煦作恶多端，欲废其为庶人，后经太子力劝，于次年将其强行迁封至山东乐安州。
description.en: In the 14th year of Yongle, the Yongle Emperor learned of Zhu Gaoxu's many wrongdoings and intended to demote him to a commoner. After the crown prince's intercession, he forcibly relocated his fief to Le'an Prefecture in Shandong the following year.

description.zh-cn: 朱瞻圻因追憾其父朱高煦杀害其母，屡次向明成祖上奏朱高煦的过恶。
description.en: Zhu Zhanqi, resentful of his father Zhu Gaoxu for killing his mother, repeatedly reported Zhu Gaoxu's wrongdoings to the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗朱高炽因朱瞻圻离间自己与朱高煦的兄弟关系，将其废为庶人，发配凤阳守皇陵。
description.en: The Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi demoted Zhu Zhanqi to a commoner and sent him to guard the imperial tombs in Fengyang because Zhu Zhanqi had sown discord between him and his brother Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗采纳杨荣建议，御驾亲征，迅速抵达乐安，迫使朱高煦出降，平定叛乱。
description.en: Accepting Yang Rong's advice, the Xuande Emperor personally led the campaign, quickly arrived at Le'an, forced Zhu Gaoxu to surrender, and suppressed the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦投降后，被明宣宗废为庶人并囚禁。后因朱高煦伸腿绊倒宣宗，宣宗大怒，命人将其置于铜缸内以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: After surrendering, Zhu Gaoxu was demoted to a commoner and imprisoned by the Xuande Emperor. Later, because Zhu Gaoxu tripped the emperor, the enraged emperor ordered him to be placed in a bronze vat and executed by burning.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦死后，其妃韦氏及全部儿子也被明宣宗派人杀死。
description.en: After Zhu Gaoxu's death, his consort Lady Wei and all his sons were also killed by order of the Xuande Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦谋反失败后，其子朱瞻圻与父同死。
description.en: After Zhu Gaoxu's failed rebellion, his son Zhu Zhanqi died along with his father.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦谋反失败后，其子朱瞻坦与父同死。
description.en: After Zhu Gaoxu's failed rebellion, his son Zhu Zhantan died along with his father.
